quote_first: An empty cryogenic support cylinder was eventually found outside his abandoned car at
quote_last: this morning near the village of Hazelbrook, thirty-six miles north of here.
quote_raw: An empty cryogenic support cylinder was eventually found outside his abandoned car at 03:32 this morning near the village of Hazelbrook, thirty-six miles north of here.
title: The Sons of Scarlatti
author: John McNally
